Topic.Title: FNAF: The Text Adventure Update, Testers Needed.

Posts.EditableText:
Hey guys! I've been away from this project for a long time, after accidentally deleting some code :,( 
So I need some people to play through the game again and report any bugs (Dead Links, Missing Sounds, Missing Pics) 
I know of some pics and sounds missing and I will be working on fixing them, if you find any, please let me know! 
Thanks, 
Minecraftpsyco99

Heres the Link: http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/lziecqjpzk2ckdplbjhuwg/five-nights-at-freddys-the-text-adventure-bug-fixing-update

Yes, I'm working on a sequel.... eventually
